Super-hydratingâ€"I use after toner but before moisturizer and it makes my moisturizer extra effective.

It's so light weight and so fresh to put on my skin.  It's the 1st thing I put on my face after toner. It really does help calm my skin of it's irritated.  10/10 recommend  Also,,,, using a bunch of dermalogica products for my skin care, I can totally see a major difference in my complexion. Those are results!!  Love this line of product

sample_reviews: I truly trust Dermalogica as a brand. Every product I've tried so far has been nothing but gentle on my skin and effective. This is a serum that sinks in quickly and visibly firms and tightens my skin. complimentary from dermalogica

I love this under my lotion. It makes my skin feel great and looks smooth. I don't know how well it improves my wrinkles, but it definitely softens my skin and helps make up sit well. My skin doesn't feel as nice without it.

I am in love with the phyto oxygen cream and this is the PERFECT companion! It is lightweight but hydrating and delivers a burst of freshness and dewy-ness to the skin. I've noticed a slight softening in fine lines, a brightening effect and overall just plumper and more hydrated, glowy skin. It has this kind of instant lifting and firming effect that just makes your skin look tighter and more even. The phyto oxygen line is my fav line from Dermalogica and they knocked it out of the park with this one! Kindly gifted by Dermalogica.

sample_reviews: The best sunscreen you can buy for anyone over 40. It's worth the money. [Link](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R34L2RXTN1BBHE/)

I use this every day to soften and protect. It is not a bit greasy or heavy like some sunscreens. I dislike scented products but love the very very light and natural scent of this product. [Link](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R1QYZX34BO1H2K/)
This is the only sunscreen I’ve ever used that didn’t dry out my skin, flake off, or pill up when I put makeup on over it! [Link](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/RZDF5YZ6G0Z2J/)
Es un kit de limpieza facial útil y necesario, cumple con las expectativas [Link](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R1TWEZR8ZYOEW6/)

Este serum tiene muy buena concentración de retinol sin causar irritación en tu piel además contiene limpios ingredientes que ayudarán proteger la barrera de tu piel [Link](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R35FVZ988253EN/)

Me encanta como queda la piel, mi piel es super delicada otros protectores me dejan la piel grasa este es muy bueno.. el precio lo vale.. [Link](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R3B5VC7C7N9ERL/)
Muy buen producto lo uso todas las mañanas y se disuelve rápido y hidrata muy bien siento que me ha protegido de arrugas [Link](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R11W5MTJPGSTU4/)
Excelente. Mi cara se ve radiante [Link](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R2MH6RPFTSBU69/)
Tengo 3 semanas usándola a diario y no he notado ningún resultado 😢 creo que siendo tan cara iba a funcionar [Link](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R27853ZPOWA7JG/)
